trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Tillhandahåller data för den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event occurs when a visual aspect of an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> changes.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem>händelsen inträffar när en visuell aspekt av en ägare ritats <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>ändringar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem>

trans-unit.source: A StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs specifies the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to use to draw the panel, the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> object in which to draw the panel, the panel identification number, state information about the panel, and the panel to draw.
trans-unit.target: En StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs anger den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objekt som ska användas för att rita panelen i <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>objekt att rita panelen, panelen identifieringsnummer, statusinformation om panelen och panelen för att rita.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: You can use the data provided by this class in an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event to create custom-drawn panels in your application's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan använda data från den här klassen i en händelsehanterare för den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem>händelsen för att skapa anpassade ritas paneler i ditt program <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs"></xref> class without specifying a background and foreground color for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs"> </xref> klass utan att ange en förgrunden och bakgrunden färg för den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to use to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> du använder för att rita den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> used to render text.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> används för att återge text.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the client area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerar det aktiva området för den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the panel in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Det nollbaserade indexet för panelen i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"></xref> values that represents state information about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"> </xref> värden som representerar statusinformation om den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> that represents the panel to draw.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref> som representerar panelen för att rita.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs"></xref> class with a specified background and foreground color for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs"> </xref> klass med en angiven förgrunden och bakgrunden färg för den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to use to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> du använder för att rita den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> used to render text.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> används för att återge text.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the client area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerar det aktiva området för den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the panel in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Det nollbaserade indexet för panelen i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"></xref> values that represents state information about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"> </xref> värden som representerar statusinformation om den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> that represents the panel to draw.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref> som representerar panelen för att rita.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> values that represents the foreground color of the panel to draw.
trans-unit.target: En av de <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> värden som representerar förgrundsfärgen på panelen om du vill rita.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> values that represents the background color of the panel to draw.
trans-unit.target: En av de <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> värden som representerar bakgrundsfärgen på panelen om du vill rita.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref> Rita.

trans-unit.source: The Panel property enables you to obtain the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> that needs to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen panelen kan du hämta den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>som måste ritas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: You can use this information within the event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control to perform drawing tasks on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan använda informationen i händelsehanteraren för <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem>händelse för en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>kontroll för att kunna utföra ritade uppgifter i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref> Rita.
